duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide primary patient care to assigned patients, including assessments, care planning, evaluation, and education in infusion therapy in home or alternate site settings.
Initiate and maintain communications with appropriate care team members for assigned patients.
Evaluate and educate patient/care partner to safely administer home infusion therapy.
Evaluate the home environment and identify interventions required for care.
Develop each patient's Care Map in conjunction with other clinical team members and evaluate patient response to therapy.
Appropriately discharge primary patients and complete discharge summary.
Develop and maintain caseload scheduling and communications.
Document patient visits to physicians or lab drawing stations.
